name: Happy Limbo BETA (Early Access)
description:
A fan of sentence finisher making games or Mad Libs? Welcome to the new game just like those! This time it's just a free project that will be worked on for awhile as we work to try to make it better!

GLITCH:

When you finish, right now it just starts you over, so please wait to criticize over that just yet, we are working on fixing that at the moment.
